price: Nyankopͻn na ͻsoro ne asaase so ahennie wͻ no. Ɛda a Dᴐnhwere no bεso no, saa Da no wͻn a wͻdii nkontompo akyire no bεbrε agu.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'ṭilūna
